name: THE ALLIANCE FOR LONGEVITY INITIATIVES
description: Advancing policies to increase a healthy human lifespan.
sampleDescriptions: Creating a dedicated regulatory pathway for longevity therapeutics. Increasing allocations at NIH for aging research.

Directing the Food and Drug Administration to create a pathway for longevity treatment. Reauthorization of the Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR) and Small Business Technology Transfer (STTR) p
Increased funding for longevity research at the National Institutes of Health
